author: jprendi
body:
Verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49886

#### PR description:

This PR adds two new Payload Inspector plots for `HcalRespCorrs` to help visualize depth-dependent correction factor effects.
1. HcalRespCorrsDepthsOverlay: TProfile that overlays all depths for correction factor vs iEta
2. HcalRespCorrsDistOverlay: 2x2 1D histograms for HB, HE, HF, HO on the correction factor


#### PR validation:

This PR was prepared in `CMSSW_16_0_X_2026-01-16-2300`. To get the plots locally, you run:

```
getPayloadData.py  --plugin pluginHcalRespCorrs_PayloadInspector --plot plot_HcalRespCorrsDepthsOverlay --tag HcalRespCorrs_2025_v7.1_data --input_params "{}" --time_type Run --iovs '{"start_iov": "1", "end_iov": "1"}' --db Prod --test
```

and 

```
getPayloadData.py  --plugin pluginHcalRespCorrs_PayloadInspector --plot plot_ HcalRespCorrsDistOverlay --tag HcalRespCorrs_2025_v7.1_data --input_params "{}" --time_type Run --iovs '{"start_iov": "1", "end_iov": "1"}' --db Prod --test
```

respectively.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This is the backport for `16_0_X` of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49886 .

cc: @mmusich
title: adding HcalRespCorrsDepthsOverlay and HcalRespCorrsDistOverlay plots [16_0_X]
